name: AddisMap
description: Addis Ababa (Ethiopia) City Map with POI locator.

name: BuioMetria Partecipativa
description: Displays darkness of the sky measured with Sky Quality Meter. Further information.

name: Cartogiraffe
description: Mobile friendly online map with standard, transport, bicycle and hiking maps.

name: Distance Calculator
description: Create paths, measure length and export to .GPX or .KMZ.

name: Freemap
description: Project to create free and annotatable maps of the UK countryside. Users can add countryside-specific data on top of the maps. Mobile Java Client is worked on (see wiki-page).

name: Freemap.sk
description: Map with tons of features, p.e. measurement of distance and area, fullscreen, bicycle and hiking routes, POIs, hills, downloadable Maps for several devices, various possibilities to export maps, routing and searching, and so on. Most of the features cover only region of Slovakia, more.

name: FreieTonne
description: Slippy Map with POI Overlay representing Seamap Information like Ports, Buoys and other seamarks even for whitewater. Apache-based offline Navigation and mapping-tools.  Support for making your own maps for Ozi, BitMap (iPhone), Seaclear ...

name: OpenTopoMap
description: Topographical maps of Europe.

name: Geofabrik  Map
description: A full-screen Slippy Map with several different  map views.

name: Gmap Pedometer
description: A Slippy Map that allows drawing of routes and calculates the distance travelled and shows elevations nicely.

name: Hitchwiki Maps
description: Worldmap for hitchhikers, showing hitching places with rating and description. Editable by everybody.

name: Leaflet Maps Marker - www.mapsmarker.com
description: Pin, organize & show your favorite places through OpenStreetMap, Google Maps, Google Earth (KML), Bing Maps, GeoJSON, GeoRSS or Augmented-Reality browsers.

name: lombardo-geosystems.it
description: Maps of Italy with city streets search and POI locator.

name: netzwolf.info OSM
description: Service of various maps.

name: OpenPoiMap
description: Show different types of POIs by user's choice.

name: OpenSeaMap
description:
Nautical Chart
showing Ports, Marinas, Lights, Seamarks, etc.
Weather chart, Weather forecast.

name: OpenTouchMap
description: Slippy map with basic IPhone gesture-capabilities using iol.js for mobile devices.

name: OSMbot for Telegram
description: OpenStreetMap bot finds any location in the world from the Nominatim OSM database.

name: Postcodes
description: Showing Postcodes of the UK of different projects (see Related Projects).

name: Show Your Places
description: Images gallery with pictures displayed on map.

name: Sputnik
description: Russian website that provides search of state services, POI's and routing to them and safe search.

name: Toner by Stamen
description: Black and white representation of map.

name: TopOSM
description: Topographic maps based on OSM data. (Currently) limited to the United States. Lars Ahlzen.

name: OSMapa
description: Style: OSMapa-Topo with hiking trails.

name: Wikimedia Commons Overlay
description: Shows overlay of georeferenced Wikimedia commons images under different render of OSM.

name: Tracks Optimizer Online
description: GPX Tracks Optimizer Online Service using Ramer–Douglas–Peucker algorithm.

name: 8-Bit Cities
description: Different major cities in 8-Bit console style graphic style.

name: Data Temperature
description: How 'hot' is a city dataset?.
documentation: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/SotM 2011 session: Insert Coin To Play

name: OpenWhateverMap
description: Using different tile source to create a mixed style mosaic map.

name: Pretty Maps
description: Very artistic map data representation.

name: Watercolour by Stamen
description: Watercoloured representation of map.

name: Treasure Maps
description: OSM map data visualized in "vintage style" to get a look like an old sketchy map, a treasure map or a pirate map.

name: 4UMaps
description: Outdoor map with hillshading, elevation lines for hiking and biking. Download free offline maps.

name: Munzee
description: Scavenger hunt game where items (mostly QR codes) are found in the real world and captured using a smartphone. Mapnik and OpenCycleMap options.

name: OMA
description: Description of hiking and cycling trails, various amenities near the trail. Listing of trails by regions. Listing of amenities and POI by regions.

name: MTB map Europe
description: Mountain bike map of Europe (recently extended from Czech Republic).

name: OpenCycleMap
description: Slippy map with contours, hill colouring, cycle routes, bicycle parking and cafes that do fryups.

name: openstreetmap.cz
description: Czech OpenStreetMap with hiking trails overlay.

name: OpenTrailView
description: Geolocate Photos of trails, paths,... and stitch them together in a Google StreetView like way.

name: PNK map
description: Custom bicycle rendering for Prahou na kole (Prague on bike).

name: XC Ski Trail Map
description: Shows cross-country ski runs around the world.

name: www.opensnowmap.org
description: Yet another ski map!.

name: European Navigable Waterways (map)
description: Map showing inland waterways (Europe).

name: osm.santolibre.net
description: Worldwide overview of MTB routes, MTB routing, MTB route details with elevation profile and points of interest.

name: haihui
description: Collection of hiking maps, optimized for mobile use.

name: Archäologie in OSM
description: Archäologie in Deutschland.

name: HistOSM
description: Historic Information/Sites.

name: Old Oakland
description: Showing historical maps of Oakland on top of a own OSM map.

name: Karte mit Stolpersteine-Layer
description: Showing {{wikipedia|en|Stolperstein}} on OSM map.

name: Meilensteine
description: Meilensteine Postmeilensäulen.

name: Historic.Place
description: Weltweite Karte Historischer Objekte in OSM.

name: F4 Map
description: WebGL technology, 3D buildings on a flat map, rotatable, shadows depending on time of day, visible rain depending on weather conditions.

name: fgmap
description: Real-time OSM map of flight position in FlightGear.

name: Glosm
description: OpenGL hardware-accelerated 3D renderer (both tile renderer and realtime first-person engine).

name: Isometric 3D map of Czech republic
description: Isometric 3D map of Czech republic (OpenKýblMap). A static Map renderer is at http://bitsteller.bplaced.net/osm/.

name: Nutiteq 3D SDK for Android
description: Android SDK supporting 3D buildings and 3D models on top of OSM flat map.

name: OSM-3D
description: Virtual Globe with SRTM terrain data and 3D buildings.

name: BBBike
description: Routing focused on bikes (no. of traffic lights, height profile, lit, road surface, …).

name: Bike Citizens
description: Bike Citizens is a navigation app designed for and by cyclists, offers offline routing, predefined tours and various routing profiles.

name: BRouter
description: BRouter: Let's get serious about bike routing. BRouter offers routing for trekking and cycling with predefined profiles and the ability to modify and upload custom profiles.

name: CycleStreets
description: Bicycle routing and planning and photo map based on OpenStreetMap data and the OpenCycleMap for the British Isles. API available.

name: KOMOOT Routing
description: calculate routes for mountain bikes, touring bikes and hiking taking your fitness level and elevation into account.

name: Naviki
description: Planning bicycle trips and routing and collecting GPS traces.

name: OpenRouteService
description: Route navigation based on osm data and TMC for car, bike and pedestrian.

name: routing.osm.ch
description: Routing with Leaflet slippy map for pedestrians (two types), cyclists (two types) and cars in Switzerland only (based on OSRM).

name: OpenTripPlanner
description: A multimodal router combining OSM and Public transport tables.

name: Ride the City
description: Bicycle routing based on OSM data. Coverage: Selected big cities (currently 42) in U.S., Canada, Australia, France, Spain, few cities in other countries.

name: Open Source Routing Machine (OSRM)
description:
A new fast routing service for car
covering the world.

name: GraphHopper
description: Fast routing for bikes, pedestrians and cars with worldwide coverage. Based on Open Source routing engine GraphHopper.

name: Valhalla
description: Worldwide routing by automobile, bus, foot, and bicycle.

name: Osmocoder
description: Geocoder für D.

name: Bärn isch eso - Die Stadttour mit der Burgergemeinde Bern
description: In sections as e.g. Hörbeiträge, Lieblingstouren or Praktisches use of OSM data and kind of OSM swiss style layer (download github).

name: Open Brewpub Map
description: Lists all pubs where you can get homebrew beer (Hausbrauerei).

name: Veganes Bern
description: Nice example of data/multimedia journalism. BZ report by journalist and visual designer about situation of vegetarian life in the city of Bern supported by SOSM's uMap tool.

name: OpenLinkMap
description: Slippy map showing additional information on the map.

name: OpenFireMap
description: Worldwide map showing fire stations and hydrants on different backgrounds.

name: Vending machines for cigarretees
description: Based on Leaflet map using an overlay showing the vendingmachines for cigarettes.

name: Wanderpferde
description: Directory of accomodations for trail riders and horses in southern Germany. Also offers routing for horseback riding.

name: Property search
description: Nestoria - Property search in Europe (UK, France, Italy, Germany, Spain), India, Brazil, Australia.

name: XAPI Viewer
description: Search and display any kind of tagged data.

name: CoinMap
description: Map showing places where Bitcoin is accepted.

name: OpenLoveMap
description: Map showing some sex-related POIs.

name: Gesucht: Die grössten Ärgernisse im Stadtberner Verkehr
description: Project for reader involvement by BZ Berner Zeitung. The readers can add their points of traffic annoyance and other readers can comment/agree.

name: WaterSupply.at
description: Map showing drinking waters sources. Apps for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone are also provided.

name: CTGuides.com
description: Generates free custom self guided walking tours around London based upon choices such as length of tour and starting points. Uses OSM data for routing.

name: 123map Illustrator Export
description: Export map regions to Adobe Illustrator.

name: Bigmap
description: Tool to create big maps.

name: cast a map
description: Online service for generating (small) personal free-of-charge maps. Individual styles can be used against payment.

name: Creating and downloading your individual multimedia map
description: Comfortable-to-use online service for creating maps with "needles" containing links to audio, photo, video. Example of a city-map.

name: EasyMap SlippyMap Generator
description: Create comfortably a SlippyMap based on OpenLayers and OSM-Tiles with  markers and different layers.

name: MapOSMatic
description: Export city maps as printer friendly PDF, SVG,...

name: OpenOrienteeringMap
description: Maps without names to improve your orienteering or play games. Only Map and the ability to print as PDF.

name: OSM POI Export
description: Export POI from OSM into different formats (TomTom overlay (ov2), Garmin (csv), gpx, kml, OziExplorer (wpt)), GeoJSON. ATM restricted to BeNeLux region.

name: Query-to-map
description: Online service for exporting POIs and lines as KML.

name: Walking Papers
description: Wizzard to print a map area for drawing on it to contribute to OSM. Currently unavailable (2015-10-14). See Field Papers.

name: Field Papers
description: Wizzard to print an map area for drawing on it to contribute to OSM.

name: Cartagen
description: Cartagen is an MIT Media lab project that renders OSM and other data in a HTML5 Canvas element dynamically on the client-side.

name: MapBBCode
description: Import or draw paths and polygons and markers on a map, embed or share or export.

name: Mittelsachsen Atlas
description: One of the first OSM maps by German officials presenting POIs of Landkreis Mittelsachsen.

name: OpenLevelUp
description: OpenLevelUp allows to navigate inside levels of a building interactively and displays pictures from the web, Mapillary or Flickr.

name: FLOSM
description: OSM with the Points of Interests of your choice, you can also download map as JPG or SVG.

name: OpenStreetBrowser
description: Interactively browse not only the map but also the contained information.

name: ÖPNVKarte
description: Map displaying routes of local public transportation (PSV) in Europe.

name: uMap
description: Draw lines, markers, texts on OpenStreetMap base layers in a web map and share and collaborate with others.

name: Wikipedia-World Layer
description: Shows categorized overlay of georeferenced Wikipedia articles.

name: Wikipedia overlay
description: Zoomzoomzoom map highlighting map objects that contain external links, such as those tagged with Key:wikipedia or Key:url, flickr, dopplr, etc.

name: ZonesWIFI
description: Search for WIFI POI by city.

name: Apple Map Tiles
description: Switching between Apple map, to OpenStreetMaps and Google Maps.

name: FacilMap
description: Layers for different OSM-, Google Maps - and Yahoo renderings, searchable using Nominatim. Easily embeddable into other web pages.

name: Geofabrik Map Compare
description: Two maps side by side. Several OpenStreetMap and Google maps are available.

name: BBBike Map Compare
description: Map Compare shows up to 93 different maps from OpenStreetMap, Google, Bing, Yahoo, Mapquest, Esri and others side by side. With the admin console you can configure your own local tile server and compare the map with others. Service by BBBike_@_World, software based on Geofabrik Map Compare.

name: OSM with Streetview
description: Compare the coverage of UK between Ordnance Survey and OSM.

name: Quadmap Compare
description: Compare 4 maps at the same time : OSM, Google Maps, Bing Maps, Yahoo Maps.

name: Appspot Transp. Map Comparison
description: Another transparent map comparison website.

name: OsmHydrant
description: Easily add or modify fire water utilities like fire hydrants, suction points and water tanks even on your smartphone. Additionally coverage can be checked on the map.

name: Wheelmap
description: Wheelchair map that let user contribute to vote for Accessibility.

name: OpenRailwayMap
description: Detailed map of the railway network, based on OpenStreetMap. It considers all rail-mounted and automotive vehicles, e.g. railways, subways, trams und miniature railways.

name: Openmap
description: Worldwide map for public transport.

name: OSM3S PT diagrams
description: Public Transport Line Diagram.

name: Actuele spoorkaart Nederland
description: Realtime train position in Netherlands.

name: Raildar
description: Realtime train position in France (TGV, TER, Transilien, ...), Denmark, Finland, Ireland.

name: TapTap Map
description: See routes for TapTap's in Haiti as well as station information.

name: World Airport Codes
description: The place to find airport codes, abbreviations, runway lengths and other airport information.

name: TransitMix
description: Tool for creating your own bus systems using OpenStreetMap data.

name: wiki
description: Monitoring the OSM edits in nearly realtime. Shows location and user name on a world map, not detailed.

name: LiveMapViewer
description: A java tool to see live changes based on Planet.osm diff.

name: live.osm.fr
description: Shows near live edits on both overview map (pin) and local map (bounding box), with stats, activity graph, and misc changeset info.

name: OSM History Viewer
description: To see the difference last change on the tags and map.

name: WHODIDIT
description: OpenStreetMap Changeset Analyzer.

name: Relation Analyzer
description: Analyze relations and find errors (optimized to find errors in the route relations).

name: How did you contribute to OSM
description: Goes back in the user edits history and shows what are the first/last edits on OSM.

name: OSM Country Statistics
description: Details on user count, speed, node count.

name: refs for U.S. interstates
description: Lists and finds the corresponding road segments and reference numbers for the American interstates.

name: Taginfo
description: List and search for all tags.

name: Verkehrszeichen Tool
description:
Wizzard to get the right tags for traffic signs
look alternative JOSM-Plugin RoadSigns.

name: layers@osm-fr
description: Overlays showing streets with no name, no ref, no oneway; fixmes & notes text; administrative boundaries .

name: Editor usage stats
description: Statistics on which editor is used most.

name: Geofabrik Tile coordinates map
description: showing coordinate grid with Tile IDs.

name: Osmose
description: Checks for errors in France (including overseas territories), Belgium, Switzerland, Iceland, Quebec, and African countries. Full list.

name: Information Freeway
description: Slippy map with tiles from Tiles@home, several sources, interface for rerender requests.

name: Keep Right
description: Displays mapping errors.

name: NoName
description: Highlights roads with no name=* tag.

name: NOVAM
description: Bus stop verification tool developed for the NaPTAN import in the UK.

name: OSM Inspector
description: Displays all kinds of possible dataset quality problems.

name: OSM Contributors by Area
description: List of contributors who have participated in a given OSM area.

name: achavi
description: Augmented OSM Change Viewer: visualizes OpenStreetMap changes based on the Overpass API Augmented Delta (adiff) query. Supports continuous monitoring of an area of interest and visualizing single changesets (with some limitations).

name: OsmLaneVisualizer
description: Schematic visualization of the lanes of a way including destination. Covers all important attributes (e.g. maxspeed=*, :lanes=*-extension and destination=*).

name: JOSM
description: Programma om offline kaarten te bewerken, enorm uit te breiden.

name: mkgmap
description: Maak kaarten van OSM voor uw apparaat van Garmin.

name: MoNav
description:
Routering met Contraction Hierarchies,
zelf in te stellen snelheidsprofielen,
extreem snelle routering met laag geheugenverbruik,
kan gigantische grafen zoals Europa op mobiele apparaten gebruiken.

name: OSM2World
description: Genereert een 3D-model van de aarde met behulp van OSM-gegevens.

name: OsmAnd
description: Navigatie, routeplanning (online/offline), weergave OSM-kaarten (raster of vector) (offline), zoeken van locaties en adressen (offline), uploaden van OSM-bugs en POI's, favorieten opslaan, openbaar-vervoers-info, etc., actieve ontwikkelgemeenschap.

name: CheckTheMonuments

Kwaliteisborging voor Monumenten
